'''It's the Same As Having Wings''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to [[gliding|glide]] continuously for over 80s.

==Trivia==
*The Chinese and Korean names are reference to the skill description {{Lang|"The Ability to Fly in the Air"|zh=在空中飞行程度的能力|ja=空を飛ぶ程度の能力}} of Reimu Hakurei in the game ''{{w|Touhou Project}}''.
